about_the_game:
This is a text game simulating business, players play an inn boss, customer service difficulties, manage this inn well.

run an inn, recruit all kinds of waiters and try not to let it go bankrupt.

hired Chef

More than one chef can be employed.

developing cuisines

Add ingredients, control the heat, and develop new cuisines.

purchase upgrade

Upgrade the current Inn, buy a new one, and provide one-stop service

random event

Illness, digging at the foot of the wall, and so on.

tourist source

Repeat customers, the weather, the attributes of waiters and so on affect the number of guests.

120 servers for players to choose from

The first experience version is written expression, and each server in the official version should match CG cards.

randomly generate chef attributes / / H2]

Once a day chef interview, chef attributes are completely randomly generated.

talent selection

At the end of each day, there will be three talents for players to choose from. Talents have little influence, but they can add up to more.

name: 龍鳳客棧

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 ， windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2Ghz++
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770 1024MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is a word game that simulates business operations. The player acts as an innkeeper to overcome various difficulties and manage the inn well.
